pv40:1.3: Taṃ dāni me na → taṃ dāni ve (bj); taṃ dāni me (pts-vp-pli1-2); na dāni me taṃ (mr) | paribhogameti → paribhogaṃ na upeti (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); paribhogaṃ upeti (sya1ed, sya2ed)
pv40:2.1: Haññāmi → vihaññāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | vāyamāmi → vāyamāmi ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
pv40:8.1: gantvāna piṭṭhito gaṇheyyāsi → iṅgha tuvaṃ piṭṭhito gaṇha ucchuṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2)
